text: Clark Tinsley Middleton (1957 â€“ October 4, 2020) was an American actor. He was best known for his roles in Kill Bill: Vol. 2, Sin City, Fringe, Snowpiercer, and The Blacklist. He was born in California. Middleton died on October 4, 2020 from the West Nile virus in Los Angeles, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from California Category:Deaths from West Nile virus
title: Clark Middleton
